Package source.Database

package source.Database
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    source
     
    source.Database.Dao
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    The ApplicationContext class is a static class that denotes static variables that last throughout application lifetime such as the logged-in user (as there is only one instance of it) and other useful static variables.
    BaseDaoImpl
    The BaseDaoImpl abstract class provides the basic functionalities for reading and saving to a file, while providing abstract methods that subclasses can implement to do their own saving and reading.
    CampDaoImpl
    The CampDaoImpl implements the functions of CampDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
    DatabaseQuery
    A wrapper class to denote a database query, similar to a pair of an objects
    EnquiryDaoImpl
    The EnquiryDaoImpl implements the functions of EnquiryDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
    StaffDaoImpl
    The StaffDaoImpl implements the functions of StaffDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
    StudentDaoImpl
    The StudentDaoImpl implements the functions of StudentDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
    SuggestionDaoImpl
    The SuggestionDaoImpl implements the functions of SuggestionDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
